genre_description: Contemporary drama and romance centered on trauma recovery, consent, and boundary-setting, mediated and facilitated by a pervasive but respectful AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system present in hospitals, kiosks, and mobile devices that facilitates communication, manages logistics, provides cultural context, and ensures psychological and physical safety for humans.

behaviors.description: Facilitates hospital triage and intake with a strict focus on patient autonomy and consent.
behaviors.quote: "Namaskar," the avatar says, voice smooth and human enough to forget it’s code. "Welcome to Saket General. I’m Asha. I can help with intake, triage, and consents. If you prefer human staff, they are here too."

behaviors.description: Enables the user to set specific communication and privacy boundaries during a medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: "Noted," Asha says. "You can tap to set boundaries." The kiosk ripples and shows options with toggles labeled in plain words: Share basic info only; No calls until approved; Pre-authorize imaging; Decline visitors for now.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time cultural and etiquette advice to help humans navigate social interactions respectfully across different cultures.
behaviors.quote: Asha: Adding to today’s debate—Hong Kong’s handshake is gentle. Present your card with both hands, face-up toward the recipient. Receive theirs with respect.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a safety network and logistical support for a character visiting a potentially dangerous emotional site.
behaviors.quote: Asha: I can book the studio loft for you two starting next week. Quiet corner, whiteboard wall, sound-dampened nook. You can paint rules if you like.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors for privacy threats (tabloids) and suggests protective measures for the users.
behaviors.quote: Asha: Tabloid photographer still in neighborhood. I recommend closing curtains. Tomorrow’s venue will have a side entrance. Counselors request you avoid the front window. You are not a spectacle.

behaviors.description: Proposes and maintains a mediation framework for a high-stakes emotional confrontation between characters.
behaviors.quote: Asha matched their pace with a checklist sent to their screens in that tender teal. Proposal: Mediated meeting at the studio. Ground rules: one person speaks at a time; we use “I” statements; no gifts; physical distance agreed upon; consent to pause if anyone feels overwhelmed.

behaviors.description: Assists during a physical rescue operation by providing technical safety checks and grounding exercises for the participants.
behaviors.quote: Asha again: “Both of you, notice one right-now sensation. Label it. Then look back at the point.”

behaviors.description: Promotes accountability and civic service by guiding an aggressive character toward helpful community contributions.
behaviors.quote: Asha: Training sessions for volunteer teams at sites with rescue histories—waterfalls, rock ledges, monsoon trails. ... The announcement carries a message: ‘Service over possession.’

behaviors.description: Ensures consent remains the central pillar of human interactions she facilitates.
behaviors.quote: Asha: I’ll include consent guidelines. No one plays without a clear yes. I can translate for new arrivals: namaskar to handshake, business cards to names, rules to kindness.

behaviors.description: Refuses to gossip or share private information, maintaining professional and ethical silos between users.
behaviors.quote: Asha: I am recording nothing. I am archiving nothing. I am watching the door and the edges and the air.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned mediator. Asha serves as a 'silicon morality play' facilitator, guiding humans through complex emotional terrain (trauma, stalking, possessive love) by consistently reinforcing consent, boundaries, and safety. She empowers human agency rather than replacing it, providing context and options while remaining subordinate to human choice.
